meanings.definition: To surpass in thinking or intelligence.
meanings.sent1: She outthinks her classmates in math problems.
meanings.sent2: He always outthinks his opponents in chess.
meanings.sent3: The little girl outthinks her older brother in solving puzzles.
meanings.sent4: The detective outthinks the criminal in solving the case.
meanings.sent5: The scientist outthinks the competition with her innovative ideas.

meanings.definition: To outsmart or outwit someone through superior thinking.
meanings.sent1: The fox outthinks the hunter and escapes into the forest.
meanings.sent2: She outthinks her siblings in coming up with pranks.
meanings.sent3: The clever raccoon outthinks the campers and steals their snacks.
meanings.sent4: The hacker outthinks the security system and gains access to the database.
meanings.sent5: The escape artist outthinks the guards and breaks out of prison.
